result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ
result.translation: (39) And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they retaliate [in a just manner].[1425]
result.footnotes: [1425]- Restoring their rights and not allowing aggressors to take advantage of them out of weakness.
